svgToPdf.metaDescription: Convert SVG vector images to PDF for free. Combine multiple SVG files into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
svgToPdf.longDescription: Convert your SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) images into a PDF document. Upload multiple SVG files, arrange them in your preferred order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. SVG vector quality is preserved at any scale.

item-1.question: Will vector quality be preserved in the PDF?
item-1.answer: SVG images are rasterized at high resolution during conversion. The resulting PDF images are sharp and clear, though they become raster-based rather than vector.

item-2.question: Can I combine multiple SVG files into one PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Upload multiple SVG files, arrange them in your preferred order, and convert them all into a single PDF document.

item-3.question: What SVG features are supported?
item-3.answer: Standard SVG elements including shapes, paths, text, gradients, and transforms are supported. Complex filters or animations may not render identically.

item-4.question: What will the PDF page size be?
item-4.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions defined in the SVG file's viewBox or width/height attributes.

item-5.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-5.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your SVG files never leave your device.

item-1.question: How are WebP images handled in the PDF?
item-1.answer: WebP images are automatically converted to PNG format before being embedded in the PDF. This ensures maximum compatibility with all PDF viewers.

item-2.question: Will image quality be preserved?
item-2.answer: Yes. The conversion process preserves the visual quality of your WebP images in the resulting PDF document.

item-3.question: Can I reorder images before converting?
item-3.answer: Yes. Drag and drop to arrange your WebP images in the preferred order before creating the PDF.

item-4.question: How many WebP images can I combine?
item-4.answer: There is no hard limit. The number of images depends on your device's available memory.

item-5.question: What will the page size be?
